name: Dr. Henry Armitage
text: [reaction] After you draw a card, discard that card and exhaust Dr. Henry Armitage: Gain 3 resources.

back_text:
[skull]: –2. If you fail, discard the top 5 cards of your deck.
[cultist]: –1 (–5 instead if there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile).
[elder_thing]: –X. Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. X is the total printed cost of those discarded cards.
name: Extracurricular Activity
text:
[skull]: –1. If you fail, discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
[cultist]: –1 (–3 instead if there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile).
[elder_thing]: –X. Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. X is the total printed cost of those discarded cards.

back_text:
Each investigator with 5 or more cards in his or her discard pile takes 1 horror. Each investigator with 10 or more cards in his or her discard pile takes 2 horror, instead.
If the players have completed The House Always Wins, advance directly to agenda 2b. If Extracurricular Activity is the first scenario in the campaign, advance to agenda 2a.
name: Quiet Halls

back_text:
If the Dormitories location is not in play, put it into play.
If The Experiment is in play, move it 1 location towards the Dormitories.
If The Experiment is not in play, spawn it in the Science Building.
name: Dead of Night
text: Each investigator's maximum hand size is reduced by 3 while checking his or her hand size during the upkeep phase.

back_text: Each investigator immediately takes 3 horror. Then, proceed to (->R4).
name: The Beast Unleashed
text: Forced – When this agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold: Instead, remove all doom in play and move The Experiment 1 location toward the Dormitories. Objective – If The Experiment enters the Dormitories, advance.

back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the set-aside “Jazz” Mulligan into the encounter deck.
name: After Hours

back_text:
If the Alchemy Labs location is not in play, put it into play. If you are at Agenda 1 or 2, spawn The Experiment in the Alchemy Labs.
If you have completed The House Always Wins, put the set-aside Alchemical Concoction into play underneath the Alchemy Labs. If Extracurricular Activity is the first scenario of the campaign, remove the set-aside Alchemical Concoction from the game, instead.
name: Rice's Whereabouts
text: [action] Spend 1 clue: Discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck (top 10 instead if there is only 1 player in the game). Forced – If you discard “Jazz” Mulligan for any reason, resolve his revelation effect. Objective – When you take control of “Jazz” Mulligan, advance.

name: Campus Safety
text: Objective – Find and complete an objective on another encounter card.

back_text: [action]: Resign. “We can't find Rice anywhere...” You leave the campus, hoping Armitage will forgive you.
name: Miskatonic Quad

back_text: Forced – At the end of your turn, if you are in the Humanities Building: Discard the top X cards of your deck, where X is the amount of horror on you.
name: Humanities Building

back_text: You must spend 1 additional action to investigate the Orne Library.
name: Orne Library

back_text: Forced – After Student Union is revealed: Put the set-aside Dormitories into play. [action] [action]: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror.
name: Student Union

back_text: Objective – If investigators in the Dormitories spend 3[per investigator] clues, as a group: (->R2)
name: Dormitories
text: The door leading into the Dormitories is locked. You cannot move into the Dormitories.

back_text: Forced – After Administration is revealed: Put the set-aside Faculty Offices into play. Forced – At the end of your turn, if you are in Administration: Discard the top card of your deck.
name: Administration

back_text: Forced – After Faculty Offices is revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Humanoid enemy and spawn it here. Shuffle the encounter deck. Objective – If investigators in the Faculty Offices spend 2[per investigator] clues, as a group: (->R1)
name: Faculty Offices
text: The door leading into the Faculty Offices is locked. You cannot move into the Faculty Offices.

name: Faculty Offices
text: The door leading into the Faculty Offices is locked. You cannot move into the Faculty Offices.

back_text: Forced – After Science Building is revealed: Put the set-aside Alchemy Labs into play. Forced – When you fail a [willpower] test in the Science Building: Take 1 damage.
name: Science Building

back_text: [action]: Investigate. If you are successful, instead of discovering clues, take the Alchemical Concoction from underneath this location if able.
name: Alchemy Labs
text: The door leading into the Alchemy Labs is locked. You cannot move into the Alchemy Labs.

name: The Experiment
text: Massive. The Experiment gets +3[per investigator] health. Forced – When the enemy phase begins: Ready The Experiment. Objective – If The Experiment is defeated, advance to act 3b.

name: Alchemical Concoction
text: [action]: Fight. This attack uses [intellect] instead of [combat]. If used to attack The Experiment, this attack deals +6 damage. If you succeed, remove Alchemical Concoction from the game.

name: "Jazz" Mulligan
text: Revelation – Put “Jazz” Mulligan into play at your location. While “Jazz” Mulligan is not controlled by a player, he gains: “[action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (3). If successful, take control of ‘Jazz' Mulligan. ” While you control “Jazz” Mulligan, you ignore the text on each unrevealed Miskatonic location.

name: Professor Warren Rice
text: You get +1 [intellect]. [reaction] After you discover the last remaining clue in your location, exhaust Professor Warren Rice: Draw 1 card.

back_text:
[skull]: –3. You may spend 3 resources to treat this token as a 0, instead.
[cultist]: –3. If you fail, discard 3 resources.
[tablet]: –2. Discard 3 resources.
name: The House Always Wins
text:
[skull]: –2. You may spend 2 resources to treat this token as a 0, instead.
[cultist]: –3. If you succeed, gain 3 resources.
[tablet]: –2. If you fail, discard 3 resources.

back_text:
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
If the players have completed Extracurricular Activity, advance directly to agenda 2b. If The House Always Wins is the first scenario in the campaign, advance to agenda 2a.
name: The Clover Club
text: Each Criminal enemy gains Aloof. If an investigator deals damage to a Criminal enemy: Immediately advance.

back_text:
Spawn a random enemy from the set-aside encounter set in Clover Club Lounge. Shuffle the rest of that encounter set, the set-aside encounter set, and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
Move all investigators and unengaged enemies from La Bella Luna to the Clover Club Lounge. Remove La Bella Luna from the game.
name: Underground Muscle
Chaos in the Clover Club
text: Forced – At the start of the enemy phase: Discard each Criminal enemy in the same location as an Abomination enemy.

back_text: Put the set-aside Darkened Hall into play. If it is Agenda 1, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Criminal enemy is discarded, and spawn that enemy in the Darkened Hall.
name: Beginner's Luck
text: [reaction] When you reveal a chaos token: You may treat that token as if it were any other token in the chaos bag. If you do, remember that you have “cheated.” (Group limit once per round.) Objective – When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance.

back_text: If the players have not yet completed Extracurricular Activity: Put the set-aside Dr. Morgan into play in the VIP Area. Advance to Act 3a – “All In.” ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– If the players have completed Extracurricular Activity: Put the set-aside Peter Clover into play in the Clover Club Bar. Search the encounter deck (or out of play) for an Abomination enemy, and spawn it in the Clover Club Bar. Advance to Act 3a – “Fold.”
name: Skin Game
text: Objective – Only investigators in the VIP Area may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

back_text: – If an investigator resigned with Dr. Francis Morgan under his or her control, (-> R2) – Otherwise, (-> R1)
name: All In
text: While Dr. Morgan is not controlled by a player, he gains “[action]: Parley. Test [willpower] (3) to shake Dr. Morgan out of his daze. If you succeed, place 1 clue from the token bank on him. If there are 1[per investigator] clues on Dr. Morgan, take control of him.” Objective – If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

back_text: – If an investigator resigned with Peter Clover under his or her control, (-> R3) – Otherwise, (-> R1)
name: Fold
text: While Peter Clover is not controlled by a player, he gains “[action]: Parley. Test [willpower] (3) to convince Peter to follow you. If you succeed, place 1 clue from the token bank on him. If there are 1[per investigator] clues on Peter Clover, take control of him.” Objective – If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

back_text: [action]: Resign. This was a bust.
name: La Bella Luna

back_text: While it is Act 1, Clover Club Lounge gains: “[action] Discard an Ally asset from your hand: Gain 2 clues from the token pool. (Limit once per game.)”
name: Clover Club Lounge

back_text:
While it is Act 1, Clover Club Bar gains: 
“[action] Spend 2 resources: Gain 2 clues from the token pool and draw 2 cards. Remember that you have ‘had a drink.' (Limit once per game.)”
name: Clover Club Bar

back_text:
While it is Act 1, Clover Club Cardroom gains:
“[action] Spend 2 resources: Reveal a random chaos token.
If it is a [elder_sign] symbol, gain 2 clues and 2 resources from the token bank.
If it is an even number, gain 2 clues from the token bank.
If it is an odd number or a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto-fail] symbol, nothing happens.”
name: Clover Club Cardroom

back_text: Forced – When Darkened Hall is revealed: Put into play the 3 set-aside Back Hall Doorway locations.
name: Darkened Hall

back_text: Forced – After you fail a skill test while investigating the Art Gallery: Lose 2 resources.
name: Back Hall Doorway

back_text: While you are in the VIP Area, you cannot draw cards or gain resources during the upkeep phase.
name: Back Hall Doorway

back_text: [action]: Resign. We can get out this way!
name: Back Hall Doorway
Clover Club Pit Boss
text: Prey – Highest [intellect]. Hunter. Forced – After an investigator at Clover Club Pit Boss's location gains any number of clues: Clover Club Pit Boss readies, engages that investigator, and makes an immediate attack.

name: Peter Clover
text: Forced – At the start of the enemy phase, if no investigator controls Peter Clover: Deal 1 damage to him. [free]Exhaust Peter Clover: Automatically evade a Criminal enemy in your location.

name: Dr. Francis Morgan
text: You get +1 [combat]. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Dr. Francis Morgan: Draw 1 card.

name: Something in the Drinks
text: Surge. Revelation – Each player who has “had a drink” loses 1 action.

name: Arousing Suspicions
text: Revelation – Place 1 doom on each Criminal enemy at your location. If no doom was placed by this effect, lose 2 resources.

name: Visions of Futures Past
text: Revelation – Test [willpower] (5). For each point you fail by, discard the top card of your deck.

name: Beyond the Veil
text: Surge. Revelation – Put Beyond the Veil into play in your threat area if there is no copy of Beyond the Veil in your threat area. Forced – If your deck has no cards in it: Take 10 damage and discard Beyond the Veil.

name: Light of Aforgomon
text: Peril. Revelation – You must attach Light of Aforgomon to either the current agenda or the current act. Limit 1 per agenda/act. Treat all damage as direct damage and all horror as direct horror.

name: Thrall
text: Spawn – Location with the most clues. Retaliate.

name: Wizard of Yog-Sothoth
text: Prey – Least cards in hand. Hunter. Forced – When the engaged investigator draws a Hex or Pact card: Wizard of Yog-Sothoth attacks that investigator.

name: Unhallowed Country
text: Revelation – Put Unhallowed Country into play in your threat area. You cannot play Ally assets. Treat the printed text box of each Ally asset you control as if it were blank. Forced – At the end of your turn: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Unhallowed Country.

name: Sordid and Silent
text: Revelation – Attach Sordid and Silent to your location. Forced – At the end of the round: Each investigator at attached location takes 1 horror. Forced – When the agenda advances: Discard Sordid and Silent.

name: Whippoorwill
text:
Aloof. Hunter.
Each investigator at Whippoorwill's location gets –1 [willpower], –1 [intellect], –1 [combat], and –1 [agility].

name: Eager for Death
text: Revelation – Test [willpower] (2). Increase this skill test's difficulty by 1 for each damage on you. If you fail, take 2 horror.

name: Cursed Luck
text: Revelation – Put Cursed Luck into play in your threat area. You get –1 skill value during skill tests. Forced – After you succeed at a skill test by 1 or more: Discard Cursed Luck.

name: Twist of Fate
text: Revelation – Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [elder_sign] symbol or positive number, nothing happens. If you reveal any other number, take 1 damage. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto-fail] symbol, take 2 horror.

name: Avian Thrall
text: Prey – Lowest [intellect]. Hunter. While Avian Thrall is being attacked using a Ranged, Firearm or Spell asset, it gets –3 fight.

name: Lupine Thrall
text: Spawn – Farthest location from you. Prey – Lowest [agility]. Hunter. Retaliate.

name: Altered Beast
text: Revelation – If there are no Abomination enemies in play, Altered Beast gains surge. Otherwise, choose an Abomination enemy. Heal all damage from that enemy and attached Altered Beast to it. Forced – When you enter attached enemy's location (or vice-versa): Take 1 horror.

name: O'Bannion's Thug
text: While O'Bannion's Thug is engaged with you, you cannot gain resources.

name: Mobster
text: Retaliate. Forced – After Mobster attacks you: Lose 1 resource.

name: Hunted Down
text: Revelation – If there are no unengaged Criminal enemies in play, Hunted Down gains surge. If there are 1 or more unengaged Criminal enemies in play, each of them moves 1 location toward you. Each Criminal enemy that engages you as a result of this effect makes an immediate attack.

name: Pushed into the Beyond
text: Revelation – Choose and shuffle a non-story asset you control into your deck and discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If a copy of that asset is discarded, take 2 horror.

name: Terror from Beyond
text: Peril. Revelation – Choose one of the following cardtypes (asset, event, or skill). Each player must discard each card in his or her hand that is of the chosen cardtype. If this is not the first copy of Terror from Beyond drawn this phase, choose two cardtypes instead.

name: Arcane Barrier
text: Revelation – Attach to your location. As an additional cost to move into or out of attached location, test [willpower] (4). If successful, discard Arcane Barrier. Otherwise, you must either cancel the effects of the move or discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

name: Conglomeration of Spheres
text: Prey – Lowest [willpower]. Hunter. Forced – After you perform an attack against the Conglomeration of Spheres using a Melee card: Discard that card.

name: Servant of the Lurker
text: Prey – Lowest [agility]. Hunter. Forced – When Servant of the Lurker attacks you: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.
